title: Buttercream chocolate cupcakes
ingredients: ['375g plain flour', '400g caster sugar', '30g unsweetened cocoa powder', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 eggs', '250ml milk', '250ml water', '250ml vegetable oil', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '50g butter', '50g margarine', '250g icing sugar', '1 pinch salt', '3 tablespoons milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
